name: Romancing SaGa 2
description: Sit upon the throne of the Varennes Empire and control several generations of rulers in a valiant battle against the Seven Heroes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10(64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 1.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 (onboard CPU) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
